Material used.Description: The experiments were conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Validation controls P/LP.Validation controls P/LP: Not applicable since no specific variants were mentioned.

Validation controls B/LB.Validation controls B/LB: Not applicable since no specific variants were mentioned.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Source: Custom assumption based on standard guidelines

Threshold for abnormal readout.Source: Custom assumption based on standard guidelines

Approved assay.Approved assay: Yes, the Western Blot method is generally used for studying AR-JP.
